description: Main application component for CalcMate, managing state, event handlers, and rendering the primary UI components.

methods.name: handleSolve
methods.description: Handles the solution event, updating current entry and history.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Handles errors by resetting current entry and setting an error message.

methods.name: handleClearHistory
methods.description: Clears the calculation history and resets state.

methods.name: handleUseHistoryEntry
methods.description: Loads a selected history entry into the current entry state.
